text: Islam is the second largest religion in Bulgaria, behind Christianity. Many sources believed that Sunni Islam of Hanafi Madh'hab and Bektashi's, is the religion of 13% of the Bulgarian population. The vast majority of Bulgarian Muslims are Turkish and Xoraxane Roma, while almost Pomak are Muslims after Turkish. Bulgaria is the main leader of the European Union by percentage of Muslims. Category:Religion in Bulgaria Bulgaria
title: Islam in Bulgaria
